name: getout
short_description:
Microsoft Outlook SyncML connector. With this connector it's possible to sync Outlook contacts and calendar with Funambol SyncML.

Currently only Funambol server v10 is supported but it's planned to add support for CalDav/CardDav protocols and support various Groupware software.

INSTALLATION:
- download and install MS Visual Studio 2012 redistributable (http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=30679)
- download and install Outlook Redemption libraries (http://www.dimastr.com/redemption/download.htm). Development version is sufficient.
- install GetOut
